testsuite.name: io.reflectoring.UserControllerProviderTest

testcase.name: userclient - a request to PUT a person

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: 0 - $ -> [{mismatch=Expected firstName='Zaphod' but was missing, diff={ - "firstName": "Zaphod", - "lastName": "Beeblebrox" + "path": "/user-service/users/42", + "timestamp": 1526914458678, + "exception": "org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageNotReadableException", + "error": "Bad Request", + "status": 400, + "message": "Required request body is missing: public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<io.reflectoring.User> io.reflectoring.UserController.updateUser(io.reflectoring.User,long)" }}, {mismatch=Expected lastName='Beeblebrox' but was missing, diff={ - "firstName": "Zaphod", - "lastName": "Beeblebrox" + "path": "/user-service/users/42", + "timestamp": 1526914458678, + "exception": "org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageNotReadableException", + "error": "Bad Request", + "status": 400, + "message": "Required request body is missing: public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<io.reflectoring.User> io.reflectoring.UserController.updateUser(io.reflectoring.User,long)" }}] 1 - Expected 'application/json;charset=UTF-8' to match 'application/json' 2 - assert expectedStatus == actualStatus | | | 200 | 400 false
